summary.span: An inline-level flow content element that provides facilities for hosting hyperlinks within flow content.

span.span: An inline-level flow content element that provides facilities for hosting hyperlinks within flow content.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 實作使用您設定屬性應該瀏覽至在按下超連結時的內容。 implements the property that you set with the of the content that should be navigated to when the Hyperlink is clicked. 瀏覽只能，不過，如果有任一個直接或間接的父系是瀏覽主機，包括， ，或可以裝載任何瀏覽器[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xbap#plural](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xbapsharpplural-md.md)](其中包括[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ie7](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ie7-md.md)]， [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ie6](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ie6-md.md)]，和Firefox 2.0 +)。 navigation can only occur, however, if either the direct or indirect parent of a is a navigation host, including , , or any browser that can host [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xbap#plural](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xbapsharpplural-md.md)] (which includes [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ie7](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ie7-md.md)], [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ie6](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ie6-md.md)], and Firefox 2.0+). 如需詳細資訊，請參閱**巡覽裝載**中的主題[巡覽概觀](~/docs/framework/wpf/app-development/navigation-overview.md)。For more information, see the **Navigation Hosts** topic in [Navigation Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/app-development/navigation-overview.md). 會強制執行強式的內容模型的子內容。 enforces a strong content model for child content. 請參閱[TextElement 內容模型概觀](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/textelement-content-model-overview.md)如需有關內容模型。See [TextElement Content Model Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/textelement-content-model-overview.md) for more information about the content model. 對這個控制項的相依性屬性可能會設定控制項的預設樣式。Dependency properties for this control might be set by the control’s default style. 如果屬性設定為預設樣式，屬性可能會變更其預設值時該控制項會出現在應用程式中。If a property is set by a default style, the property might change from its default value when the control appears in the application. 預設樣式是由決定由哪個桌面主題時，會使用應用程式正在執行。The default style is determined by which desktop theme is used when the application is running. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[預設 WPF 佈景主題](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=158252)。For more information, see [Default WPF Themes](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=158252). ## Examples 下列範例會示範簡單搭配項目。The following example shows simple use of a element. [!code-xaml[HyperlinkSnippets#_Hyperlink_NavUriXAML](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/HyperlinkSnippets/CSharp/Window1.xaml#_hyperlink_navurixaml)] 下列範例示範如何建立以程式設計的方式。The following example shows how to create a programmatically. [!code-csharp[HyperlinkSnippets#_Hyperlink_NavUri](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/HyperlinkSnippets/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#_hyperlink_navuri)] [!code-vb[HyperlinkSnippets#_Hyperlink_NavUri](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/HyperlinkSnippets/visualbasic/window1.xaml.vb#_hyperlink_navuri)]

block.para: 可以瀏覽至值屬性只有當的直接或間接父是瀏覽主機，包括， ，或可以裝載任何瀏覽器 [！INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xbap#plural](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xbapsharpplural-md.md)] (其中包含 [！INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ie7](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ie7-md.md)]，[！INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ie6](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ie6-md.md)] 和 Firefox 2.0 +)。如需詳細資訊，請參閱 * * 瀏覽主機 * * 區段中 [瀏覽 Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/app-development/navigation-overview.md)。

can navigate to the value of the property only if either the direct or indirect parent of a is a navigation host, including , , or any browser that can host [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xbap#plural](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xbapsharpplural-md.md)] (which includes [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ie7](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ie7-md.md)], [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ie6](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ie6-md.md)], and Firefox 2.0+). For more information, see the **Navigation Hosts** section in [Navigation Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/app-development/navigation-overview.md).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要連結至特定的內嵌項目，指定項目名稱前面加上井字符號 （#）。To link to a particular inline element, specify the element name preceded by a pound symbol (#). 當使用者將滑鼠停留中[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xbap](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xbap-md.md)]、[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)]儲存在屬性會顯示在狀態列中。When a user hovers the mouse over a in an [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xbap](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xbap-md.md)], the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] stored in the property is displayed in the status bar. 巡覽至這個[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)]當使用者按一下。 navigates to this [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] when the user clicks the . 如果值屬性變更之後使用者按一下,之前瀏覽後續要求，會略過的新值屬性並瀏覽至[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)]是值屬性，使用者只要按一下。If the value of the property changes after the user clicks the and before the subsequent navigation request, ignores the new value of the property and navigates to the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] that was the value of the property when the user clicked the . > [!NOTE] > 您不會限制為只能使用進行導覽。You are not restricted to only using a to do navigation. 您可以使用附加屬性，但只能從下列： ， ， ，和。You can use the attached property as well, but only from the following: , , , and . ## 相依性屬性資訊Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |識別項欄位Identifier field|| |中繼資料屬性設定為 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|無None| ## Examples 下列範例示範如何使用屬性項目。The following example shows how to use the attribute of a element. [!code-xaml[HyperlinkSnippets#_Hyperlink_NavUriXAML](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/HyperlinkSnippets/CSharp/Window1.xaml#_hyperlink_navurixaml)] 下列範例示範如何設定屬性以程式設計的方式。The following example shows how to set the property programmatically. [!code-csharp[HyperlinkSnippets#_Hyperlink_NavUri](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/HyperlinkSnippets/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#_hyperlink_navuri)] [!code-vb[HyperlinkSnippets#_Hyperlink_NavUri](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/HyperlinkSnippets/visualbasic/window1.xaml.vb#_hyperlink_navuri)] 下列範例示範如何使用**mailto:** [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_uri](~/includes/tlasharptla-uri-md.md)]開啟新郵件視窗，其中包含電子郵件地址、 電子郵件地址和主旨和電子郵件地址、 主旨和本文。The following example shows how to use a **mailto:**[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_uri](~/includes/tlasharptla-uri-md.md)] to open a new mail window that contains an email address, an email address and a subject, and an email address, subject, and body. [!code-xaml[HOWTONavigationMailToSnippet#MailToMARKUP](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/HOWTONavigationMailToSnippet/CS/HomePage.xaml#mailtomarkup)]

summary.span: Handles the routed event.

span.span: Handles the routed event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會巡覽至[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_uri](~/includes/tlasharptla-uri-md.md)]所指定屬性和標記[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)]為已瀏覽。This method navigates to the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_uri](~/includes/tlasharptla-uri-md.md)] specified by the property, and marks the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] as visited. > [!IMPORTANT] > 根據主機電腦的安全性設定，某些形式的巡覽 (例如，瀏覽至[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_unc](~/includes/tlasharptla-unc-md.md)]路徑) 不允許在網際網路區域中。Depending on the host computer's security configuration, certain forms of navigation (for example, navigating to a [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_unc](~/includes/tlasharptla-unc-md.md)] path) are not allowed in the Internet zone. 在這種情況下，這個方法會要求完全信任。In such cases, this method will demand full trust. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[程式碼存取安全性](~/docs/framework/misc/code-access-security.md)。For more information, see [Code Access Security](~/docs/framework/misc/code-access-security.md).
